name: Spice Up!
description:
Spice Up! Is a wild take on the "Seasons" theme for Trijam #70. The game, art, and music were all built in 3 hours.

You take control of a cyborg ape chef whose task is to ensure all the entrée are properly seasoned as the "servrachnids" carry the food to the dining room. You have 3 minutes to season as many dishes as you can. 

Controls: Up/Down/W/S to toggle your spice gun between seasonings, L/R/A/D to move right or left, SPACE to add the seasoning!

Main theme song by Noise Soup https://soundcloud.com/noise_soup/spice-up

Art by Alejandro Paz https://www.chorizocomic.com

Engineering by scalliondelight from @AspectMFR
